alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ellis and northwestern Navarro Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Italy, or 15 miles south of Waxahachie, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waxahachie, Ennis, Palmer, Italy, Bardwell, Bardwell Lake, Garrett, Milford, Emhouse, Reagor Springs, Avalon, Forreston, Five Points, Howard and Boyce. This includes Interstate 35E between mile markers 379 and 393. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
